snippet.title: Witchhammer - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a better look at the core gameplay of Witchhammer, a roguelike deckbuilder where real-time combat meets strategic deckbuilding. 

Use tarot cards to cast spells and adapt your deck to your playstyle to battle the Inquisition.

Wishlist Witchhammer on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2616750/Witchhammer/

__________________________________________________________________________
